B+L lenses make Balafilcon ( PureVision ) associate high rate observe stain . Subjects must grade 1 ( trace ) less corneal staining baseline measurement determine investigator subinvestigator 7 . Ocular health within normal limit determine investigator subinvestigator . 8 .
